404.subtitle: Page Not Found
404.content_html: The page you requested does not exist. Click here to continue shopping.

search.title: Search
search.no_results: Your search for "{{ terms }}" did not yield any results.
search.results_for: Your search for "{{ terms }}" revealed {{ count }} results.
search.label: Search for products on our store

password_page.title: Pre-Order Exclusive
password_page.login_form_heading: Enter store using your pre-order password
password_page.signup_form_heading: Sign up for our newsletter. We promise to send you only good things.
password_page.signup_form_success: Success! Thanks for being a part of Jack Grace USA

newsletter_form.newsletter_email: Sign up for our mailing list.
newsletter_form.confirmation: Thanks for subscribing! We promise to send you only good things.

comments.title: Leave a comment
comments.name: Name
comments.moderated: Please note, comments must be approved before they are published
comments.success_moderated: Your comment was posted successfully. We will publish it in a little while, as our blog is moderated.
comments.success: Your comment was posted successfully! Thank you!
comments.no_comments: There are no comments yet. Be the first one to post a comment on this article!

general.shipping_at_checkout: Shipping, taxes, and discounts calculated at checkout.

general.no_matches: Sorry, there are no products in this collection

form.title: Write to us
form.name: Name
form.post_success: Thanks for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

activate_account.subtext: Create your password to activate your account.

orders.title: Order history
orders.none: You haven't placed any orders yet.

recover_password.title: Reset your password
recover_password.subtext: We will send you an email to reset your password.
recover_password.success: We've sent you an email with a link to update your password.

reset_password.title: Reset account password
reset_password.subtext: Enter a new password for {{ email }}

onboarding.section_text_html: You can edit this area of your website from your Shopify admin. Go to Online Store > Themes > Customize theme and setup your home page's content as you wish!
onboarding.no_products_collection: There are no products yet, but once you begin adding them they will show up here regardless if they are in a collection.
onboarding.no_product_specified_html: Go to Online Store > Themes > Customize theme and select a product to showcase here.
onboarding.no_product_specified_and_store_empty_htm: There are no products yet in your store, but once you begin adding them, go to Online Store > Themes > Customize theme and select a product to showcase here.

issued.title: Here's your {{ value }} gift card for {{ shop }}!
issued.redeem: Use this code at checkout to redeem your gift card
